channel.title: Web Analytics on User research and data science
channel.description: Recent content in Web Analytics on User research and data science

item.title: Automating Web Analytics Using R
item.description: About this note Using googleAnalyticR package. Setting up. Data Analysis. References. Setting up Install packages Authorise GA Pull data Save data 1 Install the following R packages # Install the following R packages for easier data pulling and wrangling. "googleAnalyticsR" # to get GA data "tidyverse" # must have, includes dplyr, ggplot2, and others "devtools" # generally useful "stringr" # handy string functions "lubridate" # handy date and time functions "googleVis" # useful for some visualizations "ggthemes" # pretty plot themes "ggrepel" # non-obstructive plot labels "scales" # custom plot scales 1.
